steps.label: Initialize Application
steps.detail: Start the FastAPI application by running the main.py file.
steps.scenario: The application starts without any errors.

steps.label: Send Prospect Request
steps.detail: Send a POST request to the /prospects endpoint with valid prospect data.
steps.scenario: The server processes the request and returns a success response.

steps.label: Generate Email
steps.detail: Invoke the email generation service with the prospect data.
steps.scenario: The email is generated successfully and returned.

steps.label: Send Email
steps.detail: Send a POST request to the /email endpoint with the generated email data.
steps.scenario: The email is sent successfully and a confirmation is received.

steps.label: Create Deck
steps.detail: Send a POST request to the /decks endpoint with valid deck data.
steps.scenario: The server processes the request and returns a success response.

steps.label: Retrieve Deck
steps.detail: Send a GET request to the /decks/{deck_id} endpoint to retrieve the created deck.
steps.scenario: The server returns the deck details successfully.

failure_cases.label: Invalid Prospect Data
failure_cases.detail: Send a POST request to the /prospects endpoint with invalid data.
failure_cases.scenario: The server returns a validation error response.

failure_cases.label: Email Generation Failure
failure_cases.detail: Invoke the email generation service with incomplete prospect data.
failure_cases.scenario: The service returns an error indicating missing information.

failure_cases.label: Deck Creation Failure
failure_cases.detail: Send a POST request to the /decks endpoint with invalid deck data.
failure_cases.scenario: The server returns a validation error response.
